message:
Anybody experienced issues with communication with Web Service using USB / Mobile Internet provided by Mobinil ?

What I mean is like getting unwanted data like ads or something in the response ? Does Mobinil ( Orange ) does that ?

I have many devices communicating with Severs using Orange internet ( USB / Mobile Internet ), and sometimes they doesn't get the expected response at all, doing a debug code now to track that, but just wanted to ask if someone face issues like that ..

Sure I have all errors turned off on the server side, as I have them logged in files.

data.message: Etisalat is doing the same thing on my mobile ( pop-up etisalat ads ) while browsing. And i think the same goes for Etisalat USB Modem.
Try to use SSL as much as possible. They can't inject anything into encrypted connections.

I used to use Mobinil USB Modem, It displays a box with your internet usage every now and then. This box is injected into the websites you visit. I don't know if there are any other ads as I use ad blocker
